comments.body: Always go for core CS course bro there will be a lot of specialisations which you can explore and decide later which one you want to follow up.

It's close.

Take pes cs if you're fine with the population and the somewhat strictness

Otherwise you won't really be worse off by taking bms either. 

Just take the one closest to home or something

I am not from B'lore and I am getting these colleges through Kcet so hostel is a must for me

Okay thank you for your advice üòä
See no doubt RVCE is a good college but your comparing two different branches here. If your good at mathematics and have interest in electronics go for ECE or else you can go with CSE itself.
Ece is looking much more stable in job wise compared to cs but a masters would be preferable

Take ECE only if you are interested in ECE. 

If you are interested in CS and are getting these through KCET, then pick PES CS. I would recommend picking core CS over a specialisation, more details in the FAQs: [https://bit.ly/pesu-faq](https://bit.ly/pesu-faq)
